Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUI
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
Represents the GUI principal class. Extends Application abstract classes of javaFX library.
Author:
Stefano Fossati

    • calculateTotalResources

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> calculateTotalResources​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> deposit, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> strongBox, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDeposit)
      Calculates the total resources that a player has and returns a map.
      Parameters:
      deposit - The deposit of the resources.
      strongBox - The strongbox of the resources.
      additionalDeposit - The additional deposit of the player.
      Returns:
      The map with the number of resources that the player have in the deposit and in the strongbox.
